autotransform.command package

Submodules

autotransform.command.base module

The base class and associated classes for Command components.

class autotransform.command.base.Command(params: autotransform.command.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.command.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Command components. Used by AutoTransform to perform post-processing operations after validation, such as code generation.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Command. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses

Type

TParams

bundle() → autotransform.command.base.CommandBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

CommandBundle

abstract static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.command.base.Command

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Command.

Return type

Command

get_params() → autotransform.command.base.TParams

Gets the paramaters used to set up the Command.

Returns

The paramaters used to set up the Command.

Return type

TParams

abstract static get_type() → autotransform.command.type.CommandType

Used to map Command components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Command.

Return type

CommandType

abstract run(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Performs the post-processing steps represented by the Command.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch for which this Command is run.

class autotransform.command.base.CommandBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Command object used for JSON encoding.

params: Mapping[str, Any]
type: autotransform.command.type.CommandType

autotransform.command.factory module

A simple factory for producing Commands from type and param information.

class autotransform.command.factory.CommandFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Commands. Maps a type to a Command.

_map

A mapping from CommandType to the from_data function of the appropriate Command.

Type

Dict[CommandType, Callable[[Mapping[str, Any]], Command]]

static get(bundle: autotransform.command.base.CommandBundle) → autotransform.command.base.Command

Simple get method using the _map attribute.

Parameters

bundle (CommandBundle) – The bundled Command type and params.

Returns

An instance of the associated Command.

Return type

Command

autotransform.command.type module

The type of Command, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.command.type.CommandType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 Command to type mapping.

Module contents

Commands take a Batch that has already been transformed and validated and perform post-processing steps before the Batch is submitted, such as code generation.
